Bash(gh pr create --title "Add ILINet to respiratory bundle" --body "$\(cat <<''EOF''
## Summary
- Add `delphi_ili_fluview` weighted ILI percentage \(`delphi_fluview_wili`\) as a new flu indicator in the respiratory bundle
- Simplify epiweek-to-date conversion in `delphi_ili_fluview/ingest.R` \(use direct date addition instead of manual MMWR week calculation\)
- Clean up commented-out experimental code in `bundle_respiratory/build.R`
- Rebuild bundle parquet outputs with updated flu trends

## Test plan
- [ ] Verify `flu_overall_trends.parquet` includes the new `delphi_fluview_wili` variable
- [ ] Confirm ILINet data aligns temporally with other flu indicators
- [ ] Check that existing COVID and RSV outputs are unaffected
